title: Lysfanga: The Time Shift Warrior
notes: You need to verify this with your Epic account. Works out of the box — no extra setup needed.
genre: Strategy, Indie, Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up
description: Your Kingdom’s fate relies on you… you… and you. Rewind time to create clones of your past-selves, and fight with an army of your own. Become legion and triumph over hordes of monsters to rescue Antala in this Hack'N'Slash game with a tactical twist.
